title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: When the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank but has a valid value, the externalized text should still be able to be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
